New Records: Spencer Strider achieved a milestone with his 17th win, tying him with the most wins in the National League.
Austin Riley hit his 35th home run of the season, continuing his strong performance.
Key Match Events: The Braves secured the NL East title with a 4-1 victory over the Philadelphia Phillies.
Austin Riley hit a two-run home run in the first inning to open the scoring.
Spencer Strider recorded nine strikeouts, matching a career-high and contributing to the win.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Brian Snitker reflected on the team's journey and the significance of the win.
Spencer Strider celebrated his milestone win and the team's achievement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Braves clinched their sixth consecutive NL East title and their 18th as a franchise.
The victory marked the quickest clinch in the divisional era for the Braves.
